text: State of nature is the hypothetical conditions of human life prior to the rise of societies. State of Nature may also refer to: * The State of Nature, a 1946 novel within Paul Goodman's The Empire City epic novel tetralogy * State of Nature (album), a 2006 album by alternative rock band Vaeda * State of Nature Report, a report by the British Royal Society for the Protection of Birds
title: State of Nature
